text: aiqndramEkA#daSakapAlaqM nirva#pEnmAruqta(gm) saqptaka#pAlaqM grAma#kAmaq indra#M caiqva maqruta#Scaq svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq ta EqvAsmai# sajAqtAn praya#cCanti grAqmyE#va Ba#vatyAhavaqnIya# aiqndramadhi# Srayatiq gAr.ha#patyE mAruqtaM pA#pavasyaqsasyaq vidhRu#tyai saqptaka#pAlO mAruqtO Ba#vati saqptaga#NAq vai maqrutO#gaNaqSa EqvAsmai# sajAqtAnava# rundhE&nUqcyamA#naq A sA#dayatiq viSa#mEqvA - [  ]  58
